name: Smash It (itch)
description:
"Smash It" is a "fast pace arcade action hackn slay"-cookie clicker

Be the hero. Get more and more powerful and collect coins and beat dragons.

Features:
★ Monsters and Items
★ Skills
★ Magic Spells
★ Easy Controls
★ Achievements
★ DLCs
★ Level System
★ Fast Pace Action
★ No Story
